Pore/Structural Features.Pore Size: 3.5 Å (theoretical triangular window), 6.2 Å (average pore size from N2 adsorption)
Pore/Structural Features.Structure Type: 3D cages with interconnected tetrahedral and octahedral cavities

Other Information.Additional Info: Hydronium ions show high permeation rate through the membrane.
Vanadium ions are effectively blocked by the membrane due to their larger size.

Sieving Mechanism: Size exclusion at sub-nanometer scale facilitated by precise pore structure

Experimental Validation.Method: Concentration-driven dialysis diffusion test, Electrochemical impedance spectroscopy (EIS), VFB single cell measurements
Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: H/V selectivity: up to 194, Ion conductivity: about 0.028 S/cm, Coulombic efficiency (CE): 96.1%, Energy efficiency (EE): 83.2% at 20 mA/cm²

Other Information.Additional Info: The MOF-801 membrane was further modified with an ultrathin sPEEK polymeric coating to block intergranular defects, enhancing ion selectivity and mechanical strength.
